ygData.subject: Re: hunting spots
ygData.msgSnippet: ahh, nods,okies... I was wondering, i will have to check it out myself for bringing my ogres with me, heh Morgul ... From: Seamus McNeill
ygData.messageBody:
ahh, nods,okies...
I was wondering, i will have to check it out myself for bringing my ogres
with me, heh
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 2:58 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] hunting spots


> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
> Along the coast of certain Islands you will see little canoe's that you
> should be able to move around in. In the ocean of tears one of the people
> on the boat jumped ship...got into a canoe and just starting rowing
> away....off to find new lands I guess. Most times on the islands they
> will have boats....there are a few islands that have docks...it would
> probably be best to /con them all. I was playing my wood elf druid at the
> time not my DE SK...which would have a much more profound
> reaction::whistles::
>
> Korm
> Cazic Thule
>
